website_summaries.verdict: If you have the Galaxy S7, it's hard to go wrong with this flexible, rugged case. Excellent grip and reasonable protection with a slim, stylish fit.
pros: Sleek case with a fit that doesn't make the phone feel cumbersome
TPU material absorbs shock from most types of impact
Smooth, textured finish feels good in the hand
cons: May not protect against screen breakage from very high drops
Not compatible with many screen protectors

customer_reviews.title: I drop my phone often and this case has helped me to keep my phone in almost perfect condition till last night when the bottom side of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case about 1 year ago, and I am honestly impressed. I drop my phone often and this case has helped me to keep my phone in almost perfect condition till last night when the bottom side of my screen got cracked. Of course I am frustrated, but it took a whole year of accidents for this to happen! It's not the best case ever, but it's definitely worth a shot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Stone

customer_reviews.title: Very much worth the low cost
customer_reviews.text: Good tight fit and leaves the phone fully functional. All the cutouts are in the right spots, and the buttons are responsive but not too easy to push. To allow some uUSB connectors to seat all the way into the phone I had to shave off a little plastic from the connector (not the case). This is really a problem with some connector 'shells' being too large, and not the fault of this case.
customer_reviews.author: Zeek the Geek

customer_reviews.title: The perfect case for my S7
customer_reviews.text: For me, this is the perfect case. It adds no bulk, looks nice, and the buttons work as good or as better as on the phone directly. It does not stick in my pocket, but it has enough grip to not pop out my hand when I'm holding it. The corners have a little squeeze to them but I would not want to test it out on concrete if I can help it - to me that's a fair trade-off for no bulk. I like the looks of the simple pattern quite a bit also.
customer_reviews.author: whiterockron

customer_reviews.title: Reliable phone case
customer_reviews.text: Spigen has never failed to provide a quality phone case to date. This case fits snuggly onto my S7 and while it does add some size to the phone it feels much more comfortable in my hand and less likely to slip out. The hard shock absorbing material covering the usual bumper points provides all the security for your phones body. The face also has a slightly lifted edge which means you can safely place your phone face down without worry of scratches. I personally love the carbon fiber design and would recommend this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JaredR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for my new S7!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this about a month so far, but I'm a clumsy person who drops my phone a lot. This case has done a great job of protecting my phone as it hits a variety of hard surfaces. It's a very slim fit, which is great for my annoyingly small lady pockets, and it's comfortable and easy to hold. The buttons work very nicely, the holes are placed just right, and it looks pretty stylish. It also has a small lip to protect your screen. Get this case, not the crappy JTech ripoff of it. I definitely recommend this for S7 users who need to protect their phone.
customer_reviews.author: H. Denton

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, good grip, good protection
customer_reviews.text: My first S7 died when I dropped it while it was in a flimsy case, so I looked around before I bought this case for my second one. This case has protected my phone from 5 drops onto tile and wood surfaces. Luckily I haven't dropped it on concrete or anything that hard, so I can't speak to that, but given how sturdy it feels I would give the case a decent chance of protecting the phone in those falls.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Moore

customer_reviews.title: Slippery!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why I had such a different experience with this case than others. I agree that the case fit like a glove. It's also a good thing that it's so rugged because you'll need it! The case was much more slippery than the phone by itself or any other cases I've experienced. I felt like I was holding a bar of soap to my ear. My family agreed and started joking about all the places that someone as klutzy as I am might drop the phone. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Phone broke on the first drop
customer_reviews.text: Had my S7 3 weeks with the Spigen case. Phone fell 2 feet to a hard floor and landed on the case side, not the LCD side. Picked up the phone and my LCD had all kinds of strange patterns. Fortunately can return the phone for a replacement. I would reccomend getting the otterbox, which I compared to this case afterwards, better protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case!!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this this case. I just sent back the otter box symmetry case because it was a very poorly made. This case is great for the galaxy s7 it offers great screen protection with the raised edge and great camera protection and the cut outs are perfect for the Usb adapter, speaker and headphone jack. If you are looking for the best case out there get this one you won't be disappointed. Thanks spigen for making a Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, slim, affordable, and functional case.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, slim, affordable, and functional case. I like that it has a slim profile and minimal design. The flexible case bends to fit over the phone but still has a snug fit. I have dropped my phone several times, and this has kept it protected. Before this case, I had the Spigen Neo Hybrid case which has two pieces - a similar soft TPU case and a hard plastic bumper. The hard plastic bent from attaching and removing the case, and it eventually broke when I dropped the phone. The Rugged Armor, on the other hand, seem sto provide equal protection, but I don't have to worry about it breaking.
customer_reviews.author: gtfan062010

customer_reviews.title: A simply excellent case
customer_reviews.text: The Galaxy S7 (the phone) has two terrible qualities. First, the screen edges are super-sensitive, so the phone often registers touches just by holding. This case eliminates that problem. Second, nothing in the cosmos attracts fingerprints more than this damn phone, but after weeks of use, this case doesn't show any oil prints at all. Besides that, It's fantastic looking, protects the lens of my phone, has easy-to-press buttons, and the cutouts for headphones and power are big without being too big. It's not meant to be impenetrable armor, but it's offers perfectly sufficient protections from mild drops. I love this case.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Spigen for my Galaxy S5 a couple years ago (the phone has since died) and decided to go back to Spigen for my S7, as I was satisfied with the first case. This one is even better! It's slim, the material is matte and easy to grip even when your hand is damp, and it hasn't scuffed at all. No damage to the phone even after dropping it a bunch. Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: rimonino

customer_reviews.title: One significant flaw
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and feels solid. Doesn't add too much size, and has a raised front edge. The lines around the sides are black, despite looking colored in the photos. The one problem I found is that the edge around the camera is too high, making the pulse oximeter next to the camera not work since your finger cannot lay flat enough
customer_reviews.author: Nicholaus

customer_reviews.title: Slim, Simple, Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a slim, uncomplicated phone protector that would keep my phone from cracking/damage and not add bulk so it was easy to put into my pocket. Good deal for a good product. I've had it for quite awhile now and it doesn't show any damage. Also, while it keeps a slim profile, there's just enough of a lip on the screen side that if it were to fall face down it wouldn't let the screen crack, so long as it's a flat-ish surface with no protruding points of bobs that would spear the screen itself.
customer_reviews.author: Kelepi Ita

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case, would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old otterbox defender case that started peeling away, this cost about a third of the previous one and I'm very happy with it! The phone feels much less bulky to hold, not sure what others mean't by it being slippery as the case has a slightly rough surface. it fits the phone perfectly with an additional glass screen protector I have on it. the connector cutouts on the bottom are perfect. the carbon fiber design on the back gives it a cool look. I would highly recommend this case to anyone that's still using the Galaxy S7! :)
customer_reviews.author: shopandbuy1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case for chronic phone droppers
customer_reviews.text: This case works amazingly well. Not that anyone should plan on dropping their phone, but we all know it happens to even the best of us from time to time. Might as well be safe rather than sorry. I've already fumbled and dropped mine from about waist height a few times just since putting the case on a month ago, and phone has no signs of damage at all. It's a fairly slim, streamlined case, extremely reasonable size for such reliable protection and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for functionality and protection... 4 star for options...
customer_reviews.text: I've dropped my phone numerous times, and it never once seemed in danger! Nothing is 100% safe, and there's always going to be that instance of landing "just right," that will break anything... These are not impermeable devices, nor does the provider state their product will make it such. But, this case, has far exceeded my expectations for protection and functionality! The Keys are always easy to use, and it fits my extra shatter shield perfectly! My only issue is lack of options... I wanted to buy a few for friends, and having a choice in color variant would be nice. Hardly a deal breaker!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Favela

customer_reviews.title: Poor Grip
customer_reviews.text: It's a good slimline phone case. The only thing I didn't realize is the material of the case is really smooth and made of a material that slides easily on many surfaces instead of slightly sticking/gripping on the surface. I had hoped it was a type of material that doesn't slide as much. I have had it slide off of numerous surfaces multiple times. On the plus side, my screen hasn't cracked yet...so that's something.
customer_reviews.author: Pat D

customer_reviews.title: Durable, reliable, slim
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great case. I've had it for a year and a half now. It's slim, doesn't add to weight or dimensions too much. I've dropped my phones various time and my phone is still intact. It has a nice grip to it. The only downsides I can see is that depending on how your AUX is shaped, you may need to remove the case; some of those L-shaped aux chords may not fit all the way. And a minor thing that is a little annoying at first is that the buttons need to be broken in as it's a little hard at first.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I liked the look of the case though
customer_reviews.text: While using this case, my phone took a very short fall, maybe a foot, onto the carpet and my camera lens shattered. I had the lens replaced and it occurred again. So I'm not sure what the deal was but I believe the case dissipated shock directly to the lens. I liked the look of the case though.
customer_reviews.author: Logan T

customer_reviews.title: Slim, Durable, Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: I absolutley LOVE this case!!! 5 stars across the board! Spigen is the ONLY company I look for now with phone cases. AND it is reasonably priced. I cant speak any higher of this product. I have yet to even crack my screen or get any dings on my phone with this case. The ONLY knock is that the ports will collect a little dust, BUT because of the simple style of the case, it is seamless to clean the case and put it back on the phone!! ENJOY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tai Lamar

customer_reviews.title: ... top/bottom of the back) but fits my galaxy s7 like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Pros: fits my galaxy s7 like a glove, easy to put on, nice black matte color (the photo makes it look like there might be metallic elements, there are not), and feels sturdy. Cons: could be a smidge more 'grippy' on the outside (grips the phone perfectly but feels a bit more slick on the outside than I would like - maybe if it have little anti-skid bumps on the corners or something?) and not really a fan of the look of the textured panels at the top/bottom of the back. Overall happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: unibudfan

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and feel
customer_reviews.text: I like this case because it is easy to put on and remove for cleaning. It has a nice soft, rubbery feel to it, is very durable and it is not bulky and does not add a lot to the overall size of my phone. I had one for several years on my old phone which I lost while kayaking and I knew right away I would get the same cover for my replacement phone.
customer_reviews.author: Greg E. Baskerville

customer_reviews.title: Still Great after 6 mo. of usage!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case in June for my new Samsung S7 and it has been a wonderful case. The phone has survived multiple corner drops(usually from my lap to the floor when I stand up) The phone under the case still looks brand new. The slightly raised front keeps your screen of any surface you may place it on to prevent scratches. It doesn't add too much bulk/size to the S7 and still slides in and out of jeans pockets well. The case material hasn't stretched or deformed in any way, which has been a problem I've encountered with other cheap manufactured cases.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Geek

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: Move from an angular, more riged case to this one. It is far more comfortable. It seems quite protective and it is slimmer than other cases I've tried. The price point is great at $12 and most importantly (to me) the buttons are well defined. I used my phone as an alarm clock and nothing is more annoying than groping for the snooze and being unable to find it quickly. It's got a classic "carbon fiber esque" look and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: graybeam

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, solid case.
customer_reviews.text: Combine this phone case with a screen protector and you're pretty much set to go in terms of protecting your phone from the everyday elements and mistakes that could happen. I like to say that I'm a pretty competent user of the latest electronics/phones and I have had my fair share of phone cases that I have used as well. This Spigen case is one of the better ones to deal with given the reasonable price. It has solid, smooth rubber feel that can withstand the everyday abuse. I would definitely buy this case again if given the opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Y

customer_reviews.title: Regarding the ArmorSuit Cell Phone Screen Shield
customer_reviews.text: I found it very difficult to get the shield applied to my cell phone's face. I tried several times and never successfully removed all the bubbles from beneath the screen protector. The squeegee left unsightly marks on the underside of the film. Once I accepted the application, I then had to leave the phone off for up to 24 hours for it to dry. I've just been without a phone for more than two weeks and I find it inconvenient to have to be without it 24 hours longer. I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: suzq

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the perfect , basic case?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on my Samsung Galaxy s7 for about 4 months now and I have to say I love it. It's tough enough to withstand small drops, fits SUPER snug on the phone and is very low profile. I would recommend to anyone looking for something basic, but not basic enough to not be able to do the job it was meant to.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case! I had a leather case before this which got torn up extremely fast and this rubber case seems very durable. It's very slick and slim and lightweight. I would definitely recommend getting this if you are contemplating as it looks fantastic on a Galaxy s7.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad Bondarenko

customer_reviews.title: and not likely to get scratched easily. It's minimalist and simple and has protected my ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone case is aesthetically pleasing, very sleek, smooth (but not plastic-smooth), and not likely to get scratched easily. It's minimalist and simple and has protected my phone from breaking when I dropped it once from an estimated height of 3 feet. The edges are slightly raised so that if you place your phone screen-down, the screen isn't directly touching the surface, the case is holding your phone up and preventing screen damage.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Sarette

customer_reviews.title: 12 bucks for a nickel's worth of plastic
customer_reviews.text: 12 bucks for a nickel's worth of plastic, which is pretty much a standard for phone covers now. It's okay, no way a 5 star, which people on Amazon tend to throw around all willy-nilly. Very underwhelming. The images make it appear as if it has chrome accents, it does not. It covers the phone fine, grip is fine, not too bulky but in hind sight, I'd have ordered something different.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Honcho

customer_reviews.title: Slick case
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight and sturdy case. Fits Galaxy S7 perfectly. Buttons still easy to use. Provides a more secure grip surface for the phone (the phone without a case is slippery). I appreciate the slight lip it has over the screen, so I don't use a separate screen protector with it.
customer_reviews.author: BinYong

customer_reviews.title: Works great~
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Spigen case I've had. Personally, I never plan on buying any other brands in this up as long as they stay in business. I'm so impressed by how well these fit and how well they work. I've got my S7 more times than I can count and it's still going strong. It just does exactly what it's supposed to do and doesn't take a very much space. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wool

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very effective (I've dropped it a few times). It's a great value and the buttons line up exactly. Not bulky, it's very comfortable in the hand. The Galaxy S7 is a very slippery, hard to hold phone. This case makes it useable.
customer_reviews.author: John Toste

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Protects my phone very well, have had no issues with it. The sides of the screen are a bit hard to access with it, but I'd rather have the protection. Larger headphone cables may be tough to plug in. Otherwise great, still looks like new after almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect case for my S7. It offered just enough protection while preserving the "slim" profile of the phone, which made it easy to get in and out of my pockets. While perhaps not as protective as other bulkier cases, it was the perfect solution for my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Diversified Interest

customer_reviews.title: If you can't walk and talk at the same time...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot be trusted to own a smartphone and NOT have some sort of protective case. On a good day, I'm mildy dangerous to myself, much less my phone. The only damage my phone has suffered has been while it was outside the case. The case and my screen protector is pretty much what's holding my phone together. I highly recommend this product to any and all other casual klutzes like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Fierro-Marble

customer_reviews.title: I honestly cannot believe how happy I am with this case
customer_reviews.text: I honestly cannot believe how happy I am with this case. I actually prefer the feeling of my phone with this case on it than I do of the phone by itself, which is unusual for me. It's very thin and doesn't add much weight or size to the phone, but provides noticeable protection. Since I try to not drop my phone, I can't say with certainty how well it will protect it in that event, but I'm very happy with it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: M. Massey

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Case!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice case for the $. Husband read all the reviews, and ordered it for his G7. It's sleek, low profile, nice grip, perfect height of front ridge to protect screen, good quality rubbery, durable plastic. Wish they made it in more interesting colors for me! We both love this case!
customer_reviews.author: J. Van Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Good protection, good quality, classy looks, low cost. If I had to nitpick, the only downside at all is that the raised edges of the case along the edge of the screen make it harder to access the touchscreen along the (narrow) edges of the phone's face. But the raised edges also substantially improve the screen protection, which is a benefit to me, as my phone tends to get tossed around a fair amount.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jain

customer_reviews.title: The best protective case
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice looking case. This is the second one that I have purchased. Had a buy a new one for an upgraded phone. This is so durable and protective. I dropped my old phone several times. The case had a few dings in it but my phone was saved and looks brand new. It's very lightweight and stylish. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Cletg

customer_reviews.title: My S7 bounced off a road in this case and took no damage.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone case in August 2017. In the time since, I've dropped my S7 plenty of times on concrete, the street and inside (not on purpose!) The case has held up exceptionally well. My phone has no visible damage. There are no scratches on the case from the falls. The phone's camera cover has not shattered (I shattered it on the S6 on a different spiggen case). If you still own a Galaxy S7 in 2020, this case will keep your phone going for a while longer!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian T.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. Just go ahead and do it.
customer_reviews.text: Spigen is the only brand I buy for my phones now because for the last 5 years they have proven that they are an amazing product and seriously save my phone. I'm not super rough on my phone, but when I drop it, I like knowing that I never have to actually worry about damaging it. This case is another great one!
customer_reviews.author: Jesyka

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a "Plastic" cardboard texture. Hate that feeling.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and feels really protective for my phone.. But it has the worse feeling texture of any phone case or really any object I have felt. Like soft sandpaper. It makes me cringe. I would not buy this if I knew it wasn't a smooth texture like I though it would. I honestly only put it on when I am at a pool or outdoors for extended periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it looks and functions!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive case and works great! Even the sales girl at Verizon who helped me get my data transferred mentioned it twice! It fits my S7 with my curved glass screen protector with no issues. The holes are perfect size for all accessories and the side buttons are very responsive. Arrived quickly...before my phone. Excellent case! Order with confidence. You'll be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Move over big name brand, you got nothing on Spigen!
customer_reviews.text: A great product that makes all the sense to buy! In every sense of the word... This armor fits, covers, protects, feels and looks fabulous on my new GalS7..! There's absolutely no reason for me to spend anymore money on the other big name brands! In fact, I like this sleek look much better and so does my long time supporter friends to the Otter or Ballistic ones. So, I'm sure anybody else will too being that I think the buttons positions are well placed and thus add better functionality verses other covers.
customer_reviews.author: hankster169Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my husband and he loves it! He's had the bulky kind before and was looking for one more slim fit and low profile. This case works great! Fits his phone perfect, keeps it from sliding out of his pocket and looks amazing! Great case, especially for price. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Buggieloo

customer_reviews.title: Dropped phone once from waist high. It hit the ...
customer_reviews.text: Dropped phone once from waist high. It hit the floor on it's side and the whole back of the Galaxy 7 cracked. I'm sticking with Otter Box.
customer_reviews.author: James P

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight Literally Breaks
customer_reviews.text: The main problem that I have with the case is that it doesn't fit well. It keeps on becoming too tight so the slip on and off is not as easy. And on mine there are marks all over. Do not buy if you try to use items like pop sockets and etc. My friend had his case and he did that so the whole thing became sticky in the back. I am trying to get in touch with the seller if I can exchange this broken case because it literally does not work with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kavi Patel

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This case doesn't look like much and I was a little leery once I received it; however, it has held up well. I am not the least clumsy person and the lip on the front has saved the face of my phone several times. I recently took the case off and, despite many drops from many heights (up to about 4.5 feet) onto several surfaces (sidewalk, tables, tile floors, etc.), my phone is intact with no cracks or marks.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The texture of the plastic is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The case seems to fit the phone fine but the texture of the plastic on the case is terrible. It's hard to describe but it really just feels gross holding on to it. There are sharp edges on the case where the rounded part of the back meets the straight edge of the sides that really bother me. If you're at all sensitive to something like that, avoid this case.
customer_reviews.author: joshtheman

customer_reviews.title: ... i had an issue with the product being so perfect: )
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time i had an issue with the product being so perfect :).The case is simply amazing and protective(already dropped once and nothing happened ) except the smooth finish makes grip slippery .It just slides when you try to hold in your palms.Other wise its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rajesh Srirangam

customer_reviews.title: Fights with screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the way that it feels. I have a glass screen protector on the front of the phone. When I put the case on, it seems to do something to the screen protector and the responsiveness of the touch. Certain areas I have to press really hard in order for the touch to respond. It does not get along with my screen protector and that is the main reason why I do not like it.
customer_reviews.author: WBurhans

customer_reviews.title: Slim case with great protection
customer_reviews.text: Great case for my Gs7 edge. I hate putting cases on my phones but decided to get one this time. I really like it because it doesn't add too much bulk to the phone but it will get job done. I have confirmed this myself because I dropped my phone on hard floor and the case held up nicely. No even a tiny scratch. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Oscarin

customer_reviews.title: Dont judge a book by it's cover!
customer_reviews.text: So I got this case because I like this brand, I had a different Spigen case but it had run its coarse so I figured it was time for a new one. This material wasn't what I was expecting based on the picture so that was discouraging at first but I have had the case for months now and my phone has seen many many many falls and the case has definitely done it's job!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Thin and strong
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sturdy yet thin case. This is exactly that. With a screen protector your phone will be in great hand. Only thing I could of ask for is if there was something covering the ports on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M

customer_reviews.title: Great case, minor issue with headphone jack opening
customer_reviews.text: Loving the case so far. Only issue is that the headphone jack opening has a very small lip that prevents me from plugging in some headphone jacks. I might cut off the lip myself. Edit: I did cut the lip off myself, see the picture. Originally the headphone jack opening also had the lip that can be seen on the power cable opening. PpI recommend Spigen molds the case like this to begin with. Other than that, great lightweight low profile case that offers moderate protection.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Corry

customer_reviews.title: Case is so good I bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: This case was on my original S7 when I was in an auto accident and the phone was in great shape other than a crack in the screen that wouldn't have been protected by any case. I had to get a new S7 as a result, and I didn't hesitate to buy this one again as it proved itself the first time around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good if not better than Otterbox!
customer_reviews.text: Had this on my Galaxy S7 for almost 2 years now. I work outside doing wildlife research and am very brutal on my phone, exposure to sand, water, mud, rocks, and any number of unusual situations. My phone had dropped from my pocket, from the hood of the truck, been stepped on, etc. It still looks brand new and the screen has not cracked. I use a glass screen protector as well which has cracked recently. I'm very happy with this and love the much smaller profile compared to Otterboxes and other bulky cases.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Finn

customer_reviews.title: Good case. Feels secure and still slides in and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good case. Feels secure and still slides in and out of a pocket easily. A bit thicker than the one on my previous phone. Doesn't look as sleek, but it protects more. My old phone has a few scratches from pocket change where the case didn't cover it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cuervo

customer_reviews.title: Best overall case made.
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible OCD when it comes to phone cases. If they make this case for your phone buy it you will not be sorry this case overall is the best case made on the market for any phone it provides enough protection in case of a drop but you don't feel like you're carrying a book around. A case is supposed to provide enough protection against a fall but yet feels good in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Redding

customer_reviews.title: By far the best case I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: By far the best case I have ever had. This is my second one, first one was for my previous phone. Very impressed by the look and how well it protects the phone. I've dropped my phone numerous times thinking it was surely done, but surprisingly came out without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Cullum Stirling

customer_reviews.title: Affordable great looking cases with milspec drop peotection.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and slim. Ive bought 3 of these for my phone and other family members over the years. Dropped my phone countless times over the life and this case is still holding up. No cracks or dings on my S7, and ive had this case on it since day one and this review is being written about 4 years later.
customer_reviews.author: Garret

customer_reviews.title: I cracked the corner of my screen within a week ...
customer_reviews.text: I cracked the corner of my screen within a week of buying my phone, and completely broke it within a month of buying it and dropping it all the time with no case, and I've had this one for over a month now and haven't any scratched or cracks or problems after dropping the phone, so I guess it's working. It doesn't seem as thick or "rugged" as I expected it to be, and I considered returning it, but it seems to be doing the job without the extra bulk.
customer_reviews.author: captain p

customer_reviews.title: I like the feel of this case in my hand
customer_reviews.text: Overall, fits my phone well. After candy cases, I like the feel of this case in my hand. On top of that, the case looks great too. I deduct one star because the opening for the audio jack is not big enough. At work, I plug my phone into speakers, and the audio jack will not full seat due to interference with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Mazzoni

customer_reviews.title: Slim and great protection
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for my Samsung Galaxy S3 back in the day and loved it. So I bought one for my Samsung Galaxy S7 and then my S9. This thing is great it is slim not bulky at all and I've dropped my phone multiple times on the case and nothing. It is a great case.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: ... about 3 months ago and so far I've been pretty happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this case about 3 months ago and so far I've been pretty happy with it. It's sleek and fits the s7 well. All of the buttons are still fully functional and the camera and aux/charger inputs are accessible. (Occasionally I've had to remove the case in order to plug a larger auxiliary cable in.) My only complaint is that it does not offer as good a grip as I would like. It is rather slick in the hand and I have dropped it on numerous occasions because of this. Fortunately it protects the phone well enough to compensate, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: protective but but less bulky and less sticky
customer_reviews.text: Fits Samsung Galazy 7 perfectly. Replaced an Otterbox. The Otterbox was great but overly bulky and sticky for my slim phone trouser pocket. This is perfect. Protective , easy to hold firmly, but not bulky or sticky rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Ebsworth

customer_reviews.title: Interferes with my touch screen on the phone
customer_reviews.text: This cover was recommended for my Samsung S7. I have had problems using the touch screen on the lower right area since I have put it on my phone. I thought it was a problem with the Gorilla Screen that was on the phone but when I took it back to CPR store, they said it is the cover. When they took off the phone cover, the touch screen worked as it should. It is fairly sturdy without being too bulky. I have dropped my phone a couple of times and just have one small crack on the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Phyllis J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Case!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great looking inexpensive case. This is not like a regular crappy one piece TPU case that is loose on the sides. It fits like a glove and I feel like the phone is well protected. This case is considerably less expensive than many others, but I guarantee you that this one looks better. I like the button protrusions and they are still easy to push. The carbon fiber accents look awesome as well. Oh, and you can charge wirelessly with the case on as well.
customer_reviews.author: Window Pain

customer_reviews.title: I'm having issues using the screen. The edges of ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm having issues using the screen. The edges of the screen don't respond well. So I'm having trouble typing the "q" and "w" keys. Also if I have to tap something on the edge of the screen, i have to press hard fore a second or more. Am I the only one experiencing this issue?
customer_reviews.author: hamza ismail

customer_reviews.title: Works great with full coverage protectors.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with a glass screen protector from techmatte. Fits exactly around what little the protector did not cover. It's like they were made for each other. Haven't dropped it yet but the case makes my S7 way easier to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Case feels like it’s part of the phone
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a lot of cases over the years, and this is the best one that I can recall. It fits snugly and doesn’t add too much bulk to the phone. Most importantly, my phone hasn’t sustained any damages when I’ve dropped it.
customer_reviews.author: Abigailp

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing, i used to have an iphone 5s and 6 and with both phones id always buy a lot of cases and they would always get broken or dirty etc because of cheap materials. This is the first case that i have 1 not gotten bored of or have broken, along wifh scratching, and or sretching and it makes me happy XD i actually recommended my father and mother a case similar like this (s5 and iphone 6plus) since i liked it so much
customer_reviews.author: Humberto

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case, it protects my phone really well, and looks nice. I'm the type of person who likes to remove and put again the case all the time, the cover hasn't lost its form or anything. Spingen cover are my first choice each time I'm looking for a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar A

customer_reviews.title: looks great, low bulk, TBD on durability.  great price.
customer_reviews.text: bought a S7 on black friday. immediately went to amazon for a case. got the case on sunday. it looks great, gives a bit of protection, and doesn't have bulk. TBD if it can withstand a few drops, but so far it offers the right amount of protection with minimal bulk. screen protector NOT included --- however, this case is a steal for $8
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you want to drop your phone and break it,  this is the case for you!
customer_reviews.text: This case is so slick, it will easily slip out of your hand. The material is a weird feeling. It does fit nice and slim (why it got 2 stars) but I don't trust it, considering it slips so easily. Im not trying to crack the screen or break the back glass. Just in the day I had it, it slipped or wanted to multiple times. Save yourself some time and trouble, spend a few more dollars and get a Speck case. Ive had one for years and never had an issue or damage.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case!!
customer_reviews.text: Great case. I am a klutz so drop my devices frequently. I also accidentally started the washer with my phone in it (I had set it on top of the clothes when I carried the basket downstairs). 3 minutes in the water and the phone was not even wet inside the case.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Dropped my phone multiple times since putting this on and ...
customer_reviews.text: Dropped my phone multiple times since putting this on and it's protected it each time. When it does fall, it's normally from waist or chest height, not from a crazy height. It has a slight lip on the screen so your phone is never resting on the actual screen. Case is thin and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Car710

customer_reviews.title: Best phone case that I've used so far.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this case for my last three phones I've owned to include my work phone. It's not perfect, but has protected my screen on several drops
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY FOR NOT ALOT OF PRICE & VERY PROTECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: THIS CASE IS VERY GOOD AT PROTECTING MY PHONE (WHICH I DROP QUITE FREQUENTLY) . I'M VERY HAPPY W/ THIS PURCHASE. I DEFINITELY WOULD RECOMMEND IT. IT IS VERY SLIM IN SIZE WHICH I REALLY LIKE BECAUSE I'VE HAD OTHERS IN THE PAST, & THEY WERE TOO BULKY. I CAN FIT IT IN MY JEANS BACK POCKET & IT DOESN'T STICK OUT.
customer_reviews.author: linda ann ertel

customer_reviews.title: Slim and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a case we bought at our phone retailer that was 'guaranteed to last' but of course it started falling apart right before the year mark. This case is very sleek and has been tested by my 2 yo already. Definitely withstood a good drop and my phone hand zero damage. It fits in my pocket very well and it slim fit in my hand. My husband liked it as well and we got another one for him also,
customer_reviews.author: Aracely

customer_reviews.title: ... for my S6 and bought this immediately since I loved the one from my S6 more than any other ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the same model (of course this one is updated) for my S6 and bought this immediately since I loved the one from my S6 more than any other case. This does the job great and isn't bulky and is totes comfortable. And this does just as well as my S6's and again just a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Stop selling broken phones
customer_reviews.text: It quit working 2 weeks after i bought it will not buy another one i wasted money
customer_reviews.author: vickie stokes

customer_reviews.title: Very good case! The case is not rubbery
customer_reviews.text: Very good case! The case is not rubbery, as in it won't get stuck in your hand or pocket. My old case used to have rubber sides that would stick to my pocket as it went in. This one has "rubber" on it, but it is very smooth. I would recommend this case to anyone with a S7. Also, it works nicely with the Zagg Invisible Shield screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: Great case, somewhat false advertising
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the only case I will ever have on my S7. It has protected my phone through several accidents already and even with my rough handling of my phone shows no wear at all. I got suckered in by the "carbon fiber", I thought they were real, helping to make a stronger case- it's just the rubber that has been molded to reflect light in the pattern on carbon fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Matt PA

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad who works construction and is rough on phones. So far this case holds up to the hype. Six months later it still looks great and no cracks in the phone
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Hil

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Like this case. Nothing fancy but easy to install and hold in my hand. Dropped my phone maybe a couple of times and no damage. The kick stand works great and so far has held up better than other kick stand type phones.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Decent protection, but a bit slippery.
customer_reviews.text: Great case if you're looking for something that provides moderate protection without becoming too bulky. The material is a bit hard to hold onto, so a pop socket is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very good slim case.
customer_reviews.text: Very good slim case. I have been using Defender cases by Otterbox; they are very durable with several layers of protection, but they are very bulky. I decided to look for something much slimmer (easier to use every day), but something that would still give enough protection. This case is perfect for that. It is very slim, but it still gives enough protection (on all the edges and corners).
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy S.

customer_reviews.title: Good case for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The look of the case is very sleek and simple. It feels sturdy and doesn't seem likely to break in places where other phone cases give out easily (near the charging port). For the price of the product I would say it is worth a buy. The only "complaint" is that the material the case is made of is very smooth which makes the case feel more likely to slide out of the hand. This wouldn't deter me from buying it again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Lucido

customer_reviews.title: Good case.
customer_reviews.text: Good thin case. Adds some grip to keep phone from slipping out of my hands. I'm not used to having phone cases (hate them) but this one doesn't bother me too much. My phone doesnt feel too by either. Im sure if you're used to cases it would probably be thin to you. I'm giving it 4 stars because I don't think it's as well made as the hype.
customer_reviews.author: NJHS

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and aesthetically appeasing.
customer_reviews.text: Hate phone cases typically but this one is very sleek and feels great in the hand. It doesn't add on too much extra size either. Great phone case.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's a good case especially considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a good case especially considering the price. Fits snug, leaves plenty of room for headphone/charging ports (as well as the speaker), and I like the volume/lock button covers (some cases really screw this up). The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is that the material is too smooth and not grippy enough, so I could definitely see this slipping out of my hands in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good case but not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I like this case, it fits well and has offered good protection for my phone. It works with tempered glass screen protectors. If I had to buy a new case I would by the Spigen "Tough" Armor case instead. I bought one of those for my son and I love that one. I have nothing bad to say about this one but the Tough Armor just looks amazing and seems like it would offer a little more protection.
customer_reviews.author: LGU

customer_reviews.title: Good case!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy case. The downside is that it doesn't really protect the screen of the phone too well because my galaxy s7 fell and landed face down and it still cracked a tiny bit. The upside is that it does protect the backside along with the sides of the phone pretty well. I will say that i think this is a good case if you're going to have a glass screen protector for the screen of your phone along with it.
customer_reviews.author: DeJ

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: So, I bough this case a few months ago. Gosh, ithink it's almost six months. Can I say I LOVE it! It has not stretched out like many others I've had. It doesn't feel, or look as though I've got a case on at all. It's not at all thick or bulky. There's no visible wear on the case. Pros: Good price, fast shipping (of course), snug fit, rugged (it does say that in the product description, but you know!!) Cons: None, other than I wish I'd got it sooner. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kierstin Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Its nice and slim
customer_reviews.text: Its nice and slim. PSA..... Do not use a full size glass screen protector! The edges of this case curl over the top for protection and it will cause the glass to curve and take almost all screen sensitivity away. Remember! no full sized screen protector!!
customer_reviews.author: Stushki

customer_reviews.title: Great protection without the bulk!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, and is pretty slim, fitting comfortably in the pocket. The case has protected my phone from about 5 falls so far, one of them out of my truck onto a blacktop parking lot with no sign of damage. The buttons and port cutouts are all very functional and appropriately sized. And the front does not overlap the screen too much.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, slim and trim.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, does the job. Wanted a protective case that did not add a lot of bulk to the S7. Lightweight but more importantly very slim. Easy to get in and out of pocket. Just added a protective screen and we are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: BDG

product_meta.title: Spigen Rugged Armor Designed for Samsung Galaxy S7 Case (2016) - Black
product_meta.description: Spigen’s newly designed Rugged Armor Case for Galaxy S7 is a certified military grade drop tested case with a single flexible TPU casing. Its soft carbon fiber texture makes it easy to put on while protecting your device from drops and scratches. Made with carbon fiber texture and glossy line accents, this rugged design that will compliment any style.
feature_bullets: New look featuring glossy accents and carbon fiber textures
Flexible TPU case with interior spider-web pattern & Raised lip of 1.2mm protects screen
Air Cushion Technology for shock absorption
Tactile buttons for solid feedback and an easy press
Galaxy S7 Case Compatible with Samsung Galaxy S7 (2016)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars10,968 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
